# Load data

```{r load-data}
library(here)
library(readr)
top50 <- read_csv(here("data", "playlist_2010to2023.csv"))
head(top50)
mean(top50$track_popularity)
top50$track_name[which.max(top50$track_popularity)]
top50$artist_name[which.max(top50$track_popularity)]
top50$year[which.max(top50$track_popularity)]
```
